Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.pubsub.batcher

Class Batcher<T>

java.lang.Object
com.salesforce.multicloudj.pubsub.batcher.Batcher<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of items to batch
public class Batcher<T> extends Object
A batching system that efficiently groups individual items together and processes them in batches. This batcher can work with any type T. If T implements SizableItem, size-based batching will be used. Otherwise, only count-based batching will be applied.

    Class

    Configuration options that govern how the Batcher behaves.
    static interface

    Interface for items that can report their byte size.

    • isShutdown

    • split

      public static List<Integer> split(int n, Batcher.Options opts)
      Split determines how to split n (representing n items) into batches based on opts. It returns a slice of batch sizes. For example, Split(10) might return [10], [5, 5], or [2, 2, 2, 2, 2] depending on opts. opts may be nil to accept defaults. The sum of returned batches may be less than n (e.g., if n is 10x larger than opts.MaxBatchSize, but opts.MaxHandlers is less than 10).
      Parameters:
      n - The total number of items to split
      opts - The options to use for splitting
      Returns:
      A list of batch sizes
